column2: aegrōtāre ^ 11:49 Meus Quintus fīlius aegrōtat ^ to be ill ^ 1st conj.
putāre ^ 11:108 Syra eum mortuum esse putat ^ to think
sānāre ^ 11:27 Medicus est vir quī hominēs aegrōs sānat ^ to heal
spectāre ^ 11:76 Medicus etiam dentēs Quintī spectat ^ to watch

column3: sed apud lectum stat ^ to stand ^ 1st conj.

column2: dētergēre ^ 11:119 Aemilia sanguinem dē bracchiō fīliī dēterget ^ to wipe off ^ 2nd conj.
posse ^ 11:135 Aemila nōn putat medicum puerum aegrum sānāre posse ^ to be able ^ irr.
